languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Простите, если я потревожил вас в неподходящий момент и вызвал гнев! Однако... не кажется ли вам, что столь резкий отказ оттолкнет госпожу Кибеллу? В последнее время она выглядит... потерянной. Может быть, ваше решение заставит ее окончательно закрыться в себе?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость! Простите, если я потревожил вас в неподходящий момент и вызвал ваш гнев! Однако... не кажется ли вам, что столь резкий отказ оттолкнет госпожу Кибеллу? В последнее время она выглядит... потерянной. Может быть, ваше решение заставит ее окончательно закрыться в себе?"

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Простите, если я потревожил вас в неподходящий момент и вызвал гнев! Однако... не кажется ли вам, что столь резкий отказ оттолкнет госпожу Кибеллу? В последнее время она выглядит... потерянной. Может быть, ваше решение заставит ее окончательно закрыться в себе?"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I apologise if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... Do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision won't cause her to withdraw from the world completely?"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Verzeiht, wenn ich Euer Missfallen geweckt haben, indem ich Euch in einem ungünstigen Augenblick anspreche! Aber, ähem ... glaubt Ihr nicht, dass eine solch schroffe Ablehnung Herrin Kibellah vielleicht verstoßen könnte? Sie wirkt in letzter Zeit etwas ... verloren. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Eure Entscheidung nicht dazu führt, dass sie sich vollständig aus der Welt zurückzieht?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Verzeiht, wenn ich Euer Missfallen geweckt haben, indem ich Euch in einem ungünstigen Augenblick anspreche! Aber, ähem ... glaubt Ihr nicht, dass eine solch schroffe Ablehnung Herrin Kibellah vielleicht verstoßen könnte? Sie wirkt in letzter Zeit etwas ... verloren. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Eure Entscheidung nicht dazu führt, dass sie sich vollständig aus der Welt zurückzieht?"

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Mis disculpas si es un mal momento y le ocasiono alguna molestia! Pero, ejem... ¿no cree que un rechazo tan directo podría herir a la maestra Kibellah? En los últimos tiempos, se la ha visto... perdida. ¿Está totalmente segur{mf|o|a} de que su decisión no causará que se aísle por completo del mundo?».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Mis disculpas si es un mal momento y le ocasiono alguna molestia! Pero, ejem... ¿no cree que un rechazo tan directo podría herir a la maestra Kibellah? En los últimos tiempos, se la ha visto... perdida. ¿Está totalmente segur{mf|o|a} de que su decisión no causará que se aísle por completo del mundo?».

languages.text: 「閣下！間の悪い時にお声がけをして不興を買ってしまったのでしたら申し訳ございません！ですが、エヘン…そのように辛辣にお断りされては、キベラ様を遠ざけることになるとは思われませんか？あの方は最近、なんというか…迷っておられるようにお見受けしました。あなたの決断が彼女をこの世界から完全に引き離す原因にならないという確信がおありですか？」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"

traits.locale_text: 「閣下！間の悪い時にお声がけをして不興を買ってしまったのでしたら申し訳ございません！ですが、エヘン…そのように辛辣にお断りされては、キベラ様を遠ざけることになるとは思われませんか？あの方は最近、なんというか…迷っておられるようにお見受けしました。あなたの決断が彼女をこの世界から完全に引き離す原因にならないという確信がおありですか？」

languages.text: “大人！如果是我在不恰当的时候打扰了您，让您大发雷霆，请允许我诚挚地向您道歉！不过，嗯……如此严厉的拒绝，会不会将绮贝菈女士彻底推开？她最近看起来相当……手足无措。您这样的决定，可能会将她从你的世界彻底推开，您也是这么想的吧？”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"

traits.locale_text: “大人！如果是我在不恰当的时候打扰了您，让您大发雷霆，请允许我诚挚地向您道歉！不过，嗯……如此严厉的拒绝，会不会将绮贝菈女士彻底推开？她最近看起来相当……手足无措。您这样的决定，可能会将她从你的世界彻底推开，您也是这么想的吧？”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Toutes mes excuses si je vous dérange à un moment inopportun ! Mais, ahem... ne pensez-vous pas qu'un refus aussi catégorique risque de heurter maîtresse Kibellah ? Elle avait l'air plutôt... perdue, ces derniers temps. Ne craignez-vous pas que votre décision la pousse à se retirer complètement du monde ? »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Toutes mes excuses si je vous dérange à un moment inopportun ! Mais, ahem... ne pensez-vous pas qu'un refus aussi catégorique risque de heurter maîtresse Kibellah ? Elle avait l'air plutôt... perdue, ces derniers temps. Ne craignez-vous pas que votre décision la pousse à se retirer complètement du monde ? »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yanlış zamanda yanınıza yaklaşarak hoşnutsuzluğunuza sebebiyet verdiysem beni affedin! Fakat şöyle ki... Böylesine sert bir reddin Kibellah Hanım'ı uzaklaştırabileceğini düşünmüyor musunuz? Son zamanlarda nispeten... Derin düşüncelere dalmış görünüyor. Kararınızın hayatınızdan tamamen çekip gitmesine neden olmayacağından emin misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My apologies if I have incurred your displeasure by approaching you at a bad time! But, ahem... do you not think that such a harsh refusal might push Mistress Kibellah away? She has been looking rather... lost, as of late. Are you certain your decision might not cause her to withdraw from the world entirely?"
